about_the_game:
Uncover the story of Vasya — a courier and graffiti artist thrust into an enigma of extraterrestrial invasion entwined with the challenges of a society governed by surveillance and control. However, will speed and the ability to infiltrate any place prove to be sufficient?
The game delves into the realms of creative liberty, the struggle against systemic oppression, societal injustice, and underscores the significance of self-expression and individual value in the contemporary world.

Story

In the not-so-distant future, where the tapestry of Russian and Asian cultures weaves together, and societal fabrics are threaded with rating and surveillance systems, emerges Vasya—a courier navigating the urban landscape. Wandering amidst the structures like a molecule in a sinister crystal, he confronts checkpoints, facial recognition cameras, and ominous drones
Vasya stumbles upon a revelation: seemingly ordinary policemen are, in fact, extraterrestrials from another dimension. Now, you must delve into the mystery of the alien threat and champion the city's freedom. Employ your skill to infiltrate secure locations and expose the hidden layers between worlds.

City of Shadows

A city where blending into the shadows is futile. The places once yours now slip away. Fear and control seep into the mundane world. No refuge here—only escape endures

Parkour and Stealth

Conquer the realms and dimensions, seamlessly blending parkour and stealth in a third-person view amidst the urban sprawl. Run, leveraging the environment, Vasya's speed, and agility to slip away from the extraterrestrial threat. These streets are yours to navigate, shrouded in shadows.

Vasya

Vasya thrives in constant motion, navigating the city and his own essence through the realms of mindfulness. Where will his odyssey take him, and how will Vasya morph when faced with an ominous menace?"
Portals
To hide from those who witness all, you must maneuver with cunning. Delve into the weave of reality between dimensions using arcane practices that bestow unsettling new powers.

Small Independent Team:

The game is forged by a tight-knit, independent cadre of artists hailing from the Vasyabegi performative project. This enduring venture started as an odyssey into street subcultures, morphing into an enigmatic community. Devotees invest their time and convictions into arcane practices, their reward echoing with mindfulness and an eerie mental equilibrium.
Contact us. We're eager to hear your thoughts and intriguing perspectives.

name: Vasya Run: Ghetto Gopnik
short_description: Explore, a courier and graffiti artist caught in an extraterrestrial invasion amidst a society ruled by surveillance. Can speed and infiltration skills be enough?
supported_languages:
English*, Italian*, Spanish - Spain*, Simplified Chinese*, Portuguese - Portugal*, Russian*, Ukrainian*
*languages with full audio support
